## Navigator.getParent() method

Returns the parent of the given object instance, if any.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getParent(current: IFocusableNode): IFocusableNode | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  current | [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md) | The object to retrieve the parent of. |

**Returns:**

[IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md) \| null

The parent node of the given object, if any.
